data.eml:eml: A new species of Eutropis (Squamata: Scincidae) from Sri Lanka

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Das, Indraneil, Silva, Anslem De, Austin, Christopher C. (2008): A new species of Eutropis (Squamata: Scincidae) from Sri Lanka. Zootaxa 1700: 35-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.180777
